item.title: Shops problem? PI
item.dc:creator: @runyluny runyluny
item.description:
@runyluny wrote:

Hi creating shops seems to be easy. I already got my NPC shop keeper in my server but when it comes to the application.java i need these codes…

it tells me to search (c.getShops().openShop) then add the shop blah blah but my application.java doesn’t have (c.getShops().openShop)? i checked my other PI source and it does as soon as i type it in but for some reason this other source doesnt contain it. anyway i tried posting this code at the bottom at application.java

case (522):
c.getShops().openShop(19);
break;

and then i compile. i sign in and just see a shopkeeper which im glad to see cause im making a shop but like when i click trade nothing happens… can someone maybe tell me whats going on and how i can add the shop code in application succesfully? im a complete noob with this.

Read full topic
